widget.name: Morse code
widget.description:
Learn to write morse code by practising tapping individual words.
- focus is on learning to write/send morse code - keeps track of how many characters you know (your level) - practise a whole word at a time (choosen automatically to contain characters you know) - if you fail morsing a word, it will show what to morse, and let you try again - inspired by Farnsworth's and Koch's morse teaching method
I created this app because I want to be able to enter text / write on the smartphone without looking at it, and learning morse code seems to be the easiest way to do that.
Hope it will be useful for you too.
widget.author: Rasmus Erik Voel Jensen (solsort.com)
